name: Elminage Ibun: Ame no Mihashira
description:
The "Amaterasu Mirror" was destroyed, the balance between the six races of demons, tengu, dragons, shura, demon foxes, and humans collapsed, and youkai began to appear in the real world.

Experience an epic story in which you encounter various different worlds while fighting youkai in your adventure and solving the mystery of "Amenomihashira".
